job.title: Software Engineer

Instead, we offer a simple plain-free shopping, refinancing, and monitoring hub that works for the user through aligned incentives (we earn a tenth of what they save).Â Â We are seeking talented Software Engineers to add to our team to help people save money on debt.Â  We are looking for mission-driven candidates who want to use their skills for meaningful and challenging work. We take every opportunity to integrate a DevOps and DataOps philosophy.Our values drive our interactions with users and each other:Ownership and trust - we own key deliverables and trust teammates within their roleTransparency - we keep decision logs and the state of the company open to allÂ Be smarter, get smarter - we arenât afraid of challenging the status quoEncourage diversity, uniqueness, and idiosyncrasyÂ Take our mission seriously and ourselves lightlyRequirements3+ years of experience in modern programming languages, with a preference for Node.js/JS/ES3+ years of experience contributing to architecture and design of software systemsExperience with public cloud services, especially GCPExperience building and maintaining production software systemsExperience designing and consuming financial APIsPreferred QualificationsExperience architecting and exploring technical tradeoffs and capabilities (reliability, scaling)Startup mindset, ownership, and the appropriate balance of quality and urgencyInterest in mentoring teammates and growing into a leadership roleBenefitsWe offer between 100k-130k for Software Engineers within our experienced band, plus participation in our equity plan. We are remote first. We wonât ask you to come back to the office. We have hubs in Portland, ME, and NYC if youâd like to co-work with other team members. We 401k matching, health, vision, and dental insurance.We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, status as a veteran, or basis of disability or any other federal, state or local protected class.
